head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DARBEE, ELIZABETH ORR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DARBEE, ELIZABETH ORR

block.p: DARBEE-Elizabeth Orr. April 29. Wife of the late Robert S. Darbee, Jr. Mother of Joan, Peter, Marianne and Robert. Visiting Monday, May 1, 4 to 8 PM, Fairchild Funeral Home, 1201 Franklin Ave., Garden City. Service Tuesday, May 2, 1 PM, Garden City Community Church (Chapel), Stewart Ave. and Whitehall Blvd.
